examples: Although this is an apricot pie, it tastes peachy .

definitions.definition: Very good, excellent , typically used sarcastically to indicate a state of misery, resentment or great frustration.
examples: Oh, life is just peachy now that winter has come, it’s snowing all the time, and I’m freezing my backside off

secondary_definitions: ( colloquial ) Very good, excellent , typically used sarcastically to indicate a state of misery, resentment or great frustration.
